entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , St. Alban's
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:41 AM NST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Clearing. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Clearing this morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 12 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Increasing cloudiness. Temperature steady near minus 1 except low minus 8 inland.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Temperature steady near minus 1 except low minus 8 inland. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow or rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning then changing to rain in the afternoon. Snow inland. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 2. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Rain. Windy. Low zero. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Windy. High plus 3. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Windy. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 4. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Windy. High plus 2. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Showers. Low zero.
entry.summary: Showers. Windy. Low zero. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. High minus 2. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 22 January 2023
